mean_en: all the plants, animals and things that exist in the universe that are not made by people; the way that things happen in the physical world when it is not controlled by people
sentence: She loves to relax surrounded by nature.
sentence_trans: 她喜欢在大自然的环绕下进行放松。
word_etyma: nat出生的 + ure状态 → 出生状态 → nature天性
